text: Per Erik Gunnar Westerberg (; born 2 August 1951) is a Swedish politician. He was Speaker of the Riksdag from 2006 to 2014. He was a Member of the Riksdag from 1979 to 2014.Per Westerberg on the Riksdag website He was Sweden's Minister for Industry and Trade from 1991 to 1994. ==References== ==Other websites== *Per Westerberg on the Moderate Party website *Per Westerberg on the Riksdag website Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish businesspeople Category:Speakers of the Riksdag
title: Per Westerberg
